text: Éxito is a 2014 Korean-language EP by South Korean boy band Teen Top. The title song is "Missing" (), followed by release repackaged version of the album in the same year on November 10 "20's LOVE TWO ÉXITO", the title song was "I'm Sorry" (). ==Tracks == ==Achievement list== ===Gaon Chart=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:800px" |- !
